content: I don't believe you can place links on the blogs any longer. I felt the same way when they took JAG off the air. It was the kindest, gentlist show I've ever seen. I wanted to serve in that unit. It even had its own support system. Group hug with the two star! Oh, sir, (What is it Colonel). Someone flipped me off while driving in this morning and I almost spit out my coffee. And, I feel terrible, if not horrible. It damaged my self esteem. Let's talk about it Colonel. I know, colonel that some in Washington can be really really mean...
